sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3160 ( EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , LEAS_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LEAS_NAME , LEAS_RSNO , LEAS_TYHU , LEAS_AREA , LEAS_ADDR , LEAS_STDT , LEAS_EDDT , LEAS_DPST ) VALUES ( #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #leasSqno# , #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #leasName# , #leasRsno# , #leasTyhu# , #leasArea# , #leasAddr# , #leasStdt# , #leasEddt# , #leasDpst# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3160 SET EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , LEAS_SQNO=#leasSqno# , DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , LEAS_NAME=#leasName# , LEAS_RSNO=#leasRsno# , LEAS_TYHU=#leasTyhu# , LEAS_AREA=#leasArea# , LEAS_ADDR=#leasAddr# , LEAS_STDT=#leasStdt# , LEAS_EDDT=#leasEddt# , LEAS_DPST=#leasDpst# WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND LEAS_SQNO=#leasSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3160 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND LEAS_SQNO=#leasSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

DELETE FROM YETA3160 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , LEAS_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LEAS_NAME , LEAS_RSNO , LEAS_TYHU , LEAS_AREA , LEAS_ADDR , LEAS_STDT , LEAS_EDDT , LEAS_DPST FROM YETA3160 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND LEAS_SQNO=#leasSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , LEAS_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LEAS_NAME , LEAS_RSNO , LEAS_TYHU , LEAS_AREA , LEAS_ADDR , LEAS_STDT , LEAS_EDDT , LEAS_DPST FROM YETA3160 WHERE 1=1
EDAC_RVYY = #searchKeyword#
SETT_GBCD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , LEAS_SQNO DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3160 WHERE 1=1
EDAC_RVYY = #searchKeyword#
SETT_GBCD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
